General.Name: Oak Woods Acquisition Corporation Class A Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Oak Woods Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or other business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is based in Nepean, Canada.
General.Address: 101 Roswell Drive, Nepean, ON, Canada, K2J 0H5
